title: Essay writer
content:
주요 업무
        WE, J&B Essay Consulting, are now looking for highly qualified essay writers/ consultants. This job is ideal for someone looking for flexible, intellectually stimulating work. Pay is commensurate with experience and length of work with J&B Essay Consulting.

업무 관련 기술 / 활동 분야
        
          WordPress

채용 상세
        자격 조건 (Qualifications)•	영어권 국가 4년제 대학교 재학생 및 졸업생•	영어 에세이 작문 및 컨설팅 실력을 갖추신 분•	프리랜서로서 시간을 융통성 있게 사용하실 수 있는 분•	꼼꼼하고 책임감 있는 성격을 갖추신 분, 낙관적인 마인드를 지니신 분•	에세이 컨설팅 업무 경험 있으신 분 (우대)•	Minimum of bachelor’s degree in an English-speaking country required (Applications from current undergraduates will be also reviewed)•	Experience with essay consulting (brainstorming, outlining, writing) preferred•	Advanced English writing skills•	Able to work flexible hours and follow given deadlines•	Detail-oriented, highly responsible and positive주요 업무 (Responsibilities)•	아카데믹 영어 에세이/어드미션 에세이 컨텐츠를 활용하여 완성도 있게 작성•	가이드라인에 맞춰 에세이를 작성하여 마감 시간에 맞춰 제공•	Write/provide feedback for English essays on various academic topics/ admission essay prompts•	Provide clients thorough writing guidance based on the prepared curriculum•	Ensure to meet clients’ requests and expectations
